execution_plan.description: Compute how many distinct orders include each product; keep only products listed in fewer than two orders.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) AS order_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) < 2;

execution_plan.description: Fetch product id, name, price and color for products that appear in fewer than two orders (results from step 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_color FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
